talk_paragraph.talk_question: <html>{ui_string:1200001}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200002}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200003}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200004}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200005}</html>

$???$
The feeling that there's something more right here.
(Begin the quest by talking to Cleric Jermain at Calderock Village.)

$???$
The feeling that there's something more right here.
(Begin the quest by talking to Cleric Jermain at Calderock Village.)

$Merchant May$
How I wish merchants from Saint Haven visit Calderock more frequently. Perhaps that will stop people from calling me a countryside shop lady anymore. (Begin the quest by talking to Cleric Jermain.)

$Master Cleric Jermain$
Have a moment for my tale?

$Master Cleric Jermain${action:Talk}
During the Calderock Resistance, a great battle was fought at the Road of No Return. We held on strong, with key strategic positions secured and the support of our people.

$Master Cleric Jermain$
But war is never kind. Many good folks lost their lives there. It was a tragic loss to many families.
After the battle, people called the place, Road of No Return, because nobody was able to return alive.

$Master Cleric Jermain$
Although that happened a long time back, Calderock still caries its battle scars. Look, I've one here too. (A wide jagged scar runs along his left arm)
Losing my master at Forest of Death was bad enough and just a few days after, I've lost my one and only friend. (Sobs)

$Master Cleric Jermain$
I went back to the Road of No Return for the death anniversary of my friend. When I got there, I found something that wasn't there before.

$Master Cleric Jermain$
I found a Poison Machine at a dead end of Road of No Return.

$Master Cleric Jermain${action:Talk}
I couldn't stay away from town for long so I had no choice but to return quickly. Since then, that Poison Machine has been always on my mind.
Could you check out the place and find out who would put such a machine there there?
<html>$Invisible Body I$</html>

$Master Cleric Jermain$
When you get to the end of Road of No Return, there will be a machine just lying there. I'm afraid the monsters may be up to no good again. Please find out if this is so.

$???$
The feeling that there's something more right here.
(Find the Road of No Return, you must.)

$Merchant May$
Did you notice something about Jermain? He has been brooding ever since returning from Road of No Return. I wonder what happened to him.
(Visit Road of No Return, you must)

$Invisible Thief$
Hey there, explorer.
Just so you know, you've being a great annoyance right now.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>It does not belong you anyway. You looted it from the monsters...</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Invisible Thief$
The Poison Machine, which could have become my number ONE asset, was going to make me a fortune and you HAD to break it.
It would have been quite something, because it's so big. You have to fix it!

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>But still, stealing is a bad thing to do.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Invisible Thief$
Ok! I stole it!
I needed it to make enough gold to help me return my body to its original state!

$Invisible Thief$
Alright, ok. Relax. It wasn't like I'm stealing because I like to steal.
But I admit It was fun at first after I became invisible.

$Invisible Thief$
Soon, I realized that , even by being invisible, I couldn't become like Phantom Thief Shupin, or even a sorcerer. Therefore, in all honesty, I stole it because I wanted become my old self again. Would you understand that?
I mean, can you understand how lonely it is to be invisible?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>In that case, let's find a cure.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Invisible Thief$
Do you know what it took to move the Machine here? I only wanted to sell it and this... this.... *Sniff sniff*. had to happen... *Sniff sniff*. I only wished to do well... Why me?? But you had to come along and break it and I even had to get disciplined by a kid!... *Sniff sniff*.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(Maybe he's talking about... May?) First, let's return to the town and talk there.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Invisible Thief$
You.. you'll help me?
Yay! You should look for the person who has made the Super Detergent before. The person who made the Super Detergent , did wonders with it. I'm sure he can help

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Well then, I'll be back again. Try not to get your hopes up too much, ok?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Invisible Thief$
No. no town for me.
I have nothing there.. no home, no friends to talk to... It's just so sad

$Invisible Thief$
Ok, just take it as saving someone who is destined for great achievements.
You are all I've got, hero!

$Invisible Thief$
When I'm my old self again, the first thing I will do is to buy the best clothes I can find.
Hero, you'll be the first to see my handsome face if you can find me the cure.

$Merchant May$
Cleric Jermain told me that he encountered something strange at Road of No Return. Is it true?
I'm so~ curious.

$Master Cleric Jermain$
You're back!
So, did you find out what those monsters were up to with that machine?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>He says that he is staying away from the town.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Master Cleric Jermain$
A thief...?
Hmm...
If you can bring him to me, I think I will be able to help him with my spiritual powers.

$Master Cleric Jermain$
Really? Spirituality and beliefs cannot be forced upon someone. It is really up to him. But being invisible? That's incredible.
<html>$Quest Reward$</html>

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Let me ask May about it first.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Master Cleric Jermain$
How are you going to find the cure?

journal.title: Talk to Master Cleric Jermain
journal.contents:
Master Cleric Jermain claims to have seen something strange at Road of No Return. Listen to the details.

Calderock Village→ Cleric Jermain

journal.title: Investigate Road of No Return
journal.contents:
While Jermain was passing through Road of No Return on his friend's anniversary, he tells of a Poison Machine located at a dead end. Investigate the area.

Cristal Stream (Sigh Canyon Entrance) → Road of No Return

journal.title: Report to Master Cleric Jermain
journal.contents:
The machine at the end of Road of No Return was something that was stolen by the Invisible Thief.
Head back to town first and talk to Cleric Jermain.

Calderock Village → Master Cleric Jermain
journal.todo_msg: Return and report to Master Cleric Jermain at Calderock Village.
